title: Why do people compare Obama's last 3 years of president to Trump's first 3? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Because they are closest in time. If you compared Obama’s first three with Trump’s first three, you’d be comparing 2009–2011 with 2017–2019. Those two time periods are pretty far apart in terms of what was happening. Of course, it could also be an example of cherry picking in order to make your comparisons look better.

Because more often than not, the issue is judging their impact in the current economy. Obama’s last 3 years immediately precede Trumps first 3. There was roughly the same economy and roughly the same political situation. Obama’s first three years are an apples and oranges with the economy Trump inherited.
